1: וְזֹ֣את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> הַבְּרָכָ֗ה <sup>1293 </sup> <n>And this [is] the blessing</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בֵּרַ֥ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>blessed</n> מֹשֶׁ֛ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>wherewith Moses</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>the man</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <sup>4194 </sup> <n>his death</n>
2: וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> יְהוָ֞ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> מִסִּינַ֥י <sup>5514 </sup> <n>from Sinai</n> בָּא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> וְזָרַ֤ח <sup>2224 </sup> <n>and rose up</n> מִשֵּׂעִיר֙ <sup>8165 </sup> <n>from Seir</n> לָ֔מוֹ הוֹפִ֙יעַ֙ <sup>3313 </sup> <n>unto them he shined forth</n> מֵהַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>from mount</n> פָּארָ֔ן <sup>6290 </sup> <n>Paran</n> וְאָתָ֖ה <sup>857 </sup> <n>and he came</n> מֵרִבְבֹ֣ת <sup>7233 </sup> <n>with ten thousands</n> קֹ֑דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>of saints</n> מִֽימִינ֕וֹ <sup>3225 </sup> <n>from his right hand</n> [אֵשְׁדָּת כ] (אֵ֥שׁ ק) (דָּ֖ת <sup>799 </sup> <n>fiery law</n> ק) לָֽמוֹ׃
3: אַ֚ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>Yea</n> חֹבֵ֣ב <sup>2245 </sup> <n>he loved</n> עַמִּ֔ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> קְדֹשָׁ֖יו <sup>6918 </sup> <n>all his saints</n> בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>[are] in thy hand</n> וְהֵם֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>and they</n> תֻּכּ֣וּ <sup>8497 </sup> <n>and they sat down</n> לְרַגְלֶ֔ךָ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>at thy feet</n> יִשָּׂ֖א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>[every one] shall receive</n> מִדַּבְּרֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>1703 </sup> <n>of thy words</n>
4: תּוֹרָ֥ה <sup>8451 </sup> <n>us a law</n> צִוָּה־ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>commanded</n> לָ֖נוּ מֹשֶׁ֑ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>Moses</n> מוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <sup>4181 </sup> <n>[even] the inheritance</n> קְהִלַּ֥ת <sup>6952 </sup> <n>of the congregation</n> יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n>
5: וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בִישֻׁר֖וּן <sup>3484 </sup> <n>in Jeshurun</n> מֶ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And he was king</n> בְּהִתְאַסֵּף֙ <sup>622 </sup> <n>were gathered</n> רָ֣אשֵׁי <sup>7218 </sup> <n>when the heads</n> עָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> יַ֖חַד <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> שִׁבְטֵ֥י <sup>7626 </sup> <n>[and] the tribes</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
6: יְחִ֥י <sup>2421 </sup> <n>live</n> רְאוּבֵ֖ן <sup>7205 </sup> <n>Let Reuben</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יָמֹ֑ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and not die</n> וִיהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מְתָ֖יו <sup>4962 </sup> <n>and let [not] his men</n> מִסְפָּֽר׃ <sup>4557 </sup> <n>be few</n> ס
7: וְזֹ֣את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>regarding</n> לִֽיהוּדָה֮ <sup>3063 </sup> <n>And this [is the blessing] of Judah</n> וַיֹּאמַר֒ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and he said</n> שְׁמַ֤ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>LORD</n> ק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>the voice</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> עַמּ֖וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>him unto his people</n> תְּבִיאֶ֑נּוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and bring</n> יָדָיו֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>let his hands</n> רָ֣ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>be sufficient</n> ל֔וֹ וְעֵ֥זֶר <sup>5828 </sup> <n>for him and be thou an help</n> מִצָּרָ֖יו <sup>6862 </sup> <n>[to him] from his enemies</n> תִּהְיֶֽה׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> ס
8: וּלְלֵוִ֣י <sup>3878 </sup> <n>And of Levi</n> אָמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>he said</n> תֻּמֶּ֥יךָ <sup>8550 </sup> <n>[Let] thy Thummim</n> וְאוּרֶ֖יךָ <sup>224 </sup> <n>and thy Urim</n> לְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>one</n> חֲסִידֶ֑ךָ <sup>2623 </sup> <n>[be] with thy holy</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Whom</n> נִסִּיתוֹ֙ <sup>5254 </sup> <n>whom thou didst prove</n> בְּמַסָּ֔ה <sup>4532 </sup> <n>at Massah</n> תְּרִיבֵ֖הוּ <sup>7378 </sup> <n>[and with] whom thou didst strive</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>at</n> מֵ֥י <sup>4325 </sup> <n>at the waters</n> מְרִיבָֽה׃ <sup>4809 </sup> <n>of Meribah</n>
9: הָאֹמֵ֞ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Who said</n> לְאָבִ֤יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto his father</n> וּלְאִמּוֹ֙ <sup>517 </sup> <n>and to his mother</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> רְאִיתִ֔יו <sup>7200 </sup> <n>I have not seen</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֶחָיו֙ <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brethren</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> הִכִּ֔יר <sup>5234 </sup> <n>him neither did he acknowledge</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> [בָּנֹו כ] (בָּנָ֖יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>afflicted</n> ק) לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יָדָ֑ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>nor knew</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>for they have observed</n> אִמְרָתֶ֔ךָ <sup>565 </sup> <n>thy word</n> וּבְרִֽיתְךָ֖ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>thy covenant</n> יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃ <sup>5341 </sup> <n>and kept</n>
10: יוֹר֤וּ <sup>3384 </sup> <n>They shall teach</n> מִשְׁפָּטֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>thy judgments</n> לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob</n> וְתוֹרָתְךָ֖ <sup>8451 </sup> <n>thy law</n> לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>and Israel</n> יָשִׂ֤ימוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>they shall put</n> קְטוֹרָה֙ <sup>6988 </sup> <n>incense</n> בְּאַפֶּ֔ךָ <sup>639 </sup> <n>before</n> וְכָלִ֖יל <sup>3632 </sup> <n>thee and whole burnt sacrifice</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> מִזְבְּחֶֽךָ׃ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>upon thine altar</n>
11: בָּרֵ֤ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Bless</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> חֵיל֔וֹ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>his substance</n> וּפֹ֥עַל <sup>6467 </sup> <n>the work</n> יָדָ֖יו <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of his hands</n> תִּרְצֶ֑ה <sup>7521 </sup> <n>and accept</n> מְחַ֨ץ <sup>4272 </sup> <n>smite</n> מָתְנַ֧יִם <sup>4975 </sup> <n>through the loins</n> קָמָ֛יו <sup>6965 </sup> <n>of them that rise</n> וּמְשַׂנְאָ֖יו <sup>8130 </sup> <n>against him and of them that hate</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>not</n> יְקוּמֽוּן׃ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>again</n> ס
12: לְבִנְיָמִ֣ן <sup>1144 </sup> <n>[And] of Benjamin</n> אָמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>he said</n> יְדִ֣יד <sup>3039 </sup> <n>The beloved</n> יְהֹוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>shall dwell</n> לָבֶ֖טַח <sup>983 </sup> <n>in safety</n> עָלָ֑יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> חֹפֵ֤ף <sup>2653 </sup> <n>by him [and the LORD] shall cover</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַיּ֔וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>him all the day</n> וּבֵ֥ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> כְּתֵיפָ֖יו <sup>3802 </sup> <n>between his shoulders</n> שָׁכֵֽן׃ <sup>7931 </sup> <n>long and he shall dwell</n> ס
13: וּלְיוֹסֵ֣ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>And of Joseph</n> אָמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>he said</n> מְבֹרֶ֥כֶת <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Blessed</n> יְהֹוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אַרְצ֑וֹ <sup>776 </sup> <n>[be] his land</n> מִמֶּ֤גֶד <sup>4022 </sup> <n>for the precious things</n> שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heaven</n> מִטָּ֔ל <sup>2919 </sup> <n>for the dew</n> וּמִתְּה֖וֹם <sup>8415 </sup> <n>and for the deep</n> רֹבֶ֥צֶת <sup>7257 </sup> <n>that coucheth beneath</n> תָּֽחַת׃ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>beneath</n>
14: וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <sup>4022 </sup> <n>And for the precious</n> תְּבוּאֹ֣ת <sup>8393 </sup> <n>fruits</n> שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>[brought forth] by the sun</n> וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <sup>4022 </sup> <n>and for the precious things</n> גֶּ֥רֶשׁ <sup>1645 </sup> <n>put forth</n> יְרָחִֽים׃ <sup>3391 </sup> <n>by the moon</n>
15: וּמֵרֹ֖אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>And for the chief things</n> הַרְרֵי־ <sup>2042 </sup> <n>mountains</n> קֶ֑דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>of the ancient</n> וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <sup>4022 </sup> <n>and for the precious things</n> גִּבְע֥וֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>hills</n> עוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>of the lasting</n>
16: וּמִמֶּ֗גֶד <sup>4022 </sup> <n>And for the precious things</n> אֶ֚רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> וּמְלֹאָ֔הּ <sup>4393 </sup> <n>and fulness</n> וּרְצ֥וֹן <sup>7522 </sup> <n>thereof and [for] the good will</n> שֹׁכְנִ֖י <sup>7931 </sup> <n>of him that dwelt</n> סְנֶ֑ה <sup>5572 </sup> <n>in the bush</n> תָּב֙וֹאתָה֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>let [the blessing] come</n> לְרֹ֣אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>upon the head</n> יוֹסֵ֔ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>of Joseph</n> וּלְקָדְקֹ֖ד <sup>6936 </sup> <n>and upon the top of the head</n> נְזִ֥יר <sup>5139 </sup> <n>of him [that was] separated</n> אֶחָֽיו׃ <sup>251 </sup> <n>from his brethren</n>
17: בְּכ֨וֹר <sup>1060 </sup> <n>[is like] the firstling</n> שׁוֹר֜וֹ <sup>7794 </sup> <n>of his bullock</n> הָדָ֣ר <sup>1926 </sup> <n>His glory</n> ל֗וֹ וְקַרְנֵ֤י <sup>7161 </sup> <n>and his horns</n> רְאֵם֙ <sup>7214 </sup> <n>of unicorns</n> קַרְנָ֔יו <sup>7161 </sup> <n>[are like] the horns</n> בָּהֶ֗ם עַמִּ֛ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> יְנַגַּ֥ח <sup>5055 </sup> <n>with them he shall push</n> יַחְדָּ֖ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> אַפְסֵי־ <sup>657 </sup> <n>to the ends</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> וְהֵם֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>and those</n> רִבְב֣וֹת <sup>7233 </sup> <n>and they [are] the ten thousands</n> אֶפְרַ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>of Ephraim</n> וְהֵ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>and those</n> אַלְפֵ֥י <sup>505 </sup> <n>and they [are] the thousands</n> מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <sup>4519 </sup> <n>of Manasseh</n> ס
18: וְלִזְבוּלֻ֣ן <sup>2074 </sup> <n>And of Zebulun</n> אָמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>he said</n> שְׂמַ֥ח <sup>8055 </sup> <n>Rejoice</n> זְבוּלֻ֖ן <sup>2074 </sup> <n>Zebulun</n> בְּצֵאתֶ֑ךָ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>in thy going out</n> וְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <sup>3485 </sup> <n>and Issachar</n> בְּאֹהָלֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>168 </sup> <n>in thy tents</n>
19: עַמִּים֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> הַר־ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>unto the mountain</n> יִקְרָ֔אוּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>They shall call</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> יִזְבְּח֣וּ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>there they shall offer</n> זִבְחֵי־ <sup>2077 </sup> <n>sacrifices</n> צֶ֑דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>of righteousness</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>out</n> שֶׁ֤פַע <sup>8228 </sup> <n>[of] the abundance</n> יַמִּים֙ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the seas</n> יִינָ֔קוּ <sup>3243 </sup> <n>for they shall suck</n> וּשְׂפוּנֵ֖י <sup>8226 </sup> <n>and [of] treasures</n> טְמ֥וּנֵי <sup>2934 </sup> <n>hid</n> חֽוֹל׃ <sup>2344 </sup> <n>in the sand</n> ס
20: וּלְגָ֣ד <sup>1410 </sup> <n>And of Gad</n> אָמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>he said</n> בָּר֖וּךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Blessed</n> מַרְחִ֣יב <sup>7337 </sup> <n>[be] he that enlargeth</n> גָּ֑ד <sup>1410 </sup> <n>Gad</n> כְּלָבִ֣יא <sup>3833 </sup> <n>as a lion</n> שָׁכֵ֔ן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>he dwelleth</n> וְטָרַ֥ף <sup>2963 </sup> <n>and teareth</n> זְר֖וֹעַ <sup>2220 </sup> <n>the arm</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>with</n> קָדְקֹֽד׃ <sup>6936 </sup> <n>the crown of the head</n>
21: וַיַּ֤רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>And he provided</n> רֵאשִׁית֙ <sup>7225 </sup> <n>the first part</n> ל֔וֹ כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> שָׁ֛ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> חֶלְקַ֥ת <sup>2513 </sup> <n>for himself because there [in] a portion</n> מְחֹקֵ֖ק <sup>2710 </sup> <n>of the lawgiver</n> סָפ֑וּן <sup>5603 </sup> <n>[was he] seated</n> וַיֵּתֵא֙ <sup>857 </sup> <n>and he came</n> רָ֣אשֵׁי <sup>7218 </sup> <n>with the heads</n> עָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> צִדְקַ֤ת <sup>6666 </sup> <n>the justice</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> עָשָׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>he executed</n> וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and his judgments</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>with Israel</n> ס
22: וּלְדָ֣ן <sup>1835 </sup> <n>And of Dan</n> אָמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>he said</n> דָּ֖ן <sup>1835 </sup> <n>Dan</n> גּ֣וּר <sup>1482 </sup> <n>whelp</n> אַרְיֵ֑ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>[is] a lion's</n> יְזַנֵּ֖ק <sup>2187 </sup> <n>he shall leap</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַבָּשָֽׁן׃ <sup>1316 </sup> <n>from Bashan</n>
23: וּלְנַפְתָּלִ֣י <sup>5321 </sup> <n>And of Naphtali</n> אָמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>he said</n> נַפְתָּלִי֙ <sup>5321 </sup> <n>O Naphtali</n> שְׂבַ֣ע <sup>7649 </sup> <n>satisfied</n> רָצ֔וֹן <sup>7522 </sup> <n>with favour</n> וּמָלֵ֖א <sup>4392 </sup> <n>and full</n> בִּרְכַּ֣ת <sup>1293 </sup> <n>with the blessing</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> יָ֥ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>thou the west</n> וְדָר֖וֹם <sup>1864 </sup> <n>and the south</n> יְרָֽשָׁה׃ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>possess</n> ס
24: וּלְאָשֵׁ֣ר <sup>836 </sup> <n>And of Asher</n> אָמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>he said</n> בָּר֥וּךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>[be] blessed</n> מִבָּנִ֖ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>with children</n> אָשֵׁ֑ר <sup>836 </sup> <n>[Let] Asher</n> יְהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> רְצוּי֙ <sup>7521 </sup> <n>let him be acceptable</n> אֶחָ֔יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>to his brethren</n> וְטֹבֵ֥ל <sup>2881 </sup> <n>and let him dip</n> בַּשֶּׁ֖מֶן <sup>8081 </sup> <n>in oil</n> רַגְלֽוֹ׃ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>his foot</n>
25: בַּרְזֶ֥ל <sup>1270 </sup> <n>[shall be] iron</n> וּנְחֹ֖שֶׁת <sup>5178 </sup> <n>and brass</n> מִנְעָלֶ֑יךָ <sup>4515 </sup> <n>Thy shoes</n> וּכְיָמֶ֖יךָ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>and as thy days</n> דָּבְאֶֽךָ׃ <sup>1679 </sup> <n>[so shall] thy strength</n>
26: אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> כָּאֵ֖ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>[There is] none like unto the God</n> יְשֻׁר֑וּן <sup>3484 </sup> <n>of Jeshurun</n> רֹכֵ֤ב <sup>7392 </sup> <n>[who] rideth</n> שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>upon the heaven</n> בְעֶזְרֶ֔ךָ <sup>5828 </sup> <n>in thy help</n> וּבְגַאֲוָת֖וֹ <sup>1346 </sup> <n>and in his excellency</n> שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <sup>7834 </sup> <n>on the sky</n>
27: מְעֹנָה֙ <sup>4585 </sup> <n>[is thy] refuge</n> אֱלֹ֣הֵי <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> קֶ֔דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>The eternal</n> וּמִתַּ֖חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>and underneath</n> זְרֹעֹ֣ת <sup>2220 </sup> <n>arms</n> עוֹלָ֑ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>and underneath [are] the everlasting</n> וַיְגָ֧רֶשׁ <sup>1644 </sup> <n>and he shall thrust out</n> מִפָּנֶ֛יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from before</n> אוֹיֵ֖ב <sup>341 </sup> <n>the enemy</n> וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>thee and shall say</n> הַשְׁמֵֽד׃ <sup>8045 </sup> <n>Destroy</n>
28: וַיִּשְׁכֹּן֩ <sup>7931 </sup> <n>then shall dwell</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> בֶּ֤טַח <sup>983 </sup> <n>in safety</n> בָּדָד֙ <sup>910 </sup> <n>alone</n> עֵ֣ין <sup>5869 </sup> <n>the fountain</n> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>in</n> אֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>[shall be] upon a land</n> דָּגָ֣ן <sup>1715 </sup> <n>of corn</n> וְתִיר֑וֹשׁ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>and wine</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>also</n> שָׁמָ֖יו <sup>8064 </sup> <n>also his heavens</n> יַ֥עַרְפוּ <sup>6201 </sup> <n>shall drop down</n> טָֽל׃ <sup>2919 </sup> <n>dew</n>
29: אַשְׁרֶ֨יךָ <sup>835 </sup> <n>Happy</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>[art] thou O Israel</n> מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> כָמ֗וֹךָ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>is like</n> עַ֚ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>who [is] like unto thee O people</n> נוֹשַׁ֣ע <sup>3467 </sup> <n>saved</n> בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>by the LORD</n> מָגֵ֣ן <sup>4043 </sup> <n>the shield</n> עֶזְרֶ֔ךָ <sup>5828 </sup> <n>of thy help</n> וַאֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>and</n> חֶ֖רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>and who [is] the sword</n> גַּאֲוָתֶ֑ךָ <sup>1346 </sup> <n>of thy excellency</n> וְיִכָּֽחֲשׁ֤וּ <sup>3584 </sup> <n>shall be found liars</n> אֹיְבֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>341 </sup> <n>and thine enemies</n> לָ֔ךְ וְאַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> בָּמוֹתֵ֥ימוֹ <sup>1116 </sup> <n>upon their high places</n> תִדְרֹֽךְ׃ <sup>1869 </sup> <n>unto thee and thou shalt tread</n> ס
